Package org.group8.simulator.model

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
org.group8.simulator.model.Patient
public class Patient extends Object
The Patient class represents a patient in the healthcare simulation. It tracks the patient's arrival and departure times, as well as system-wide statistics such as the total time patients have spent in the system and the number of patients completed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient()
      Constructor for creating a new Patient object. Automatically assigns a unique ID and logs the patient's arrival time.

  • Method Details

    • getDepartureTime

      public double getDepartureTime()
      Gets the departure time of the patient.
      Returns:
      the departure time of the patient.

    • setDepartureTime

      public void setDepartureTime(double departureTime)
      Sets the departure time for the patient.
      Parameters:
      departureTime - The time the patient departs.

    • report

      public void report()
      Generates a report for the patient, logging their visit details. Updates system-wide statistics such as total time spent in the system and the number of completed patients.

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Returns the ID of the patient as a string.
      Returns:
      the ID of the patient.

    • getTotalTime

      public static double getTotalTime()
      Returns the total time spent by all patients in the system.
      Returns:
      total time spent by all patients.

    • getTotalPatients

      public static int getTotalPatients()
      Returns the total number of patients created.
      Returns:
      the total number of patients.

    • getCompletedPatients

      public static int getCompletedPatients()
      Returns the number of patients that have completed their visit.
      Returns:
      the number of completed patients.

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      Resets the static fields that track the total number of patients, total time spent in the system, and the number of completed patients. This is useful for resetting the system state between simulations.

    • getArrivalTime

      public double getArrivalTime()
      Gets the arrival time of the patient.

      the arrival time of the patient.
